text: main ( ) { long int t , n , a [ 50010 ] , i ; long long int s ; scanf ( "%ld" , & t ) ; while ( t ) { s = 0 ; scanf ( "%ld" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%ld" , & a [ i ] ) ; } for ( i = 0 ; i < n - 1 ; i ++ ) { if ( a [ i ] == 0 ) { continue ; } if ( a [ i ] > a [ i + 1 ] ) { s = s + a [ i + 1 ] ; a [ i ] = 0 ; } else { s = s + a [ i ] ; a [ i + 1 ] = 0 ; } } printf ( "%lld\n" , s ) ; t -- ; } }
